name: Autolayout Responsive tables for data
description:
This file is a preview.

The original design 100% editable can be found on my Gumroad page.

---------------------------------------------------------

I created this Responsive table system so you can use it in your work and spend less time designing it from scratch!


AND to make your life easier, I designed 20 tables ready to use!


Or you'll simply copy and paste the design system (from the original file - not this preview) on your file so you'll be able to create your own !
